messages.subject: RE: [Unschooling-dotcom] Dh's going gamely along
messages.msgSnippet: ... ROTFLMAO!! Too funny Nancy! I think that would probably drive Jeff over the edge. Hmmm...maybe I should tell him about all the yurt talk here so he knows
messages.messageBody:
> Our poor husbands! <g> Darin is one who would rather just
> follow the quote
> mainstream too. But he goes along nicely anyway. This
> weekend, I was looking
> at Yurts online and he looked over my shoulder and said
> "Ummm, Nancy?!" poor
> guy! I just turned and smiled and said, "Don't worry honey, I'm just
> looking!" to which he said, "That's what I am afraid of!"
> ~Nancy

ROTFLMAO!! Too funny Nancy! I think that would probably drive Jeff
over the edge. Hmmm...maybe I should tell him about all the yurt
talk here so he knows that I could be worse LOL!

Stephanie E.

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Dh's going gamely along
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 10/6/02 9:30:42 PM Central Daylight Time, ... Our poor husbands!  Darin is one who would rather just follow the quote mainstream too. But
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 10/6/02 9:30:42 PM Central Daylight Time,
stephanie.elms@... writes:


> HeHeHe...just as he gets used
> to me I go and find all sorts of new wacko ideas like unschooling!
>
> AH well, I just have to keep reminding myself that he will come around.
> I just don't want him to think that I don't care what he thinks. It is
> just that I tend to put more research and thought into our parenting.
> He tends to do what his parents did and does not question mainstream
> parenting. Lucky him to be married to me I guess!
>
> Stephanie E.
>

Our poor husbands! <g> Darin is one who would rather just follow the quote
mainstream too. But he goes along nicely anyway. This weekend, I was looking
at Yurts online and he looked over my shoulder and said "Ummm, Nancy?!" poor
guy! I just turned and smiled and said, "Don't worry honey, I'm just
looking!" to which he said, "That's what I am afraid of!"
~Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
